subject: RE: [junit] junit & JSP
msgSnippet: You could run your JUnit tests directly from the JSP, or you could deploy the JSP s and run a suite of client tests using JUnit and HTTPUnit.  See
messageBody:
You could run your JUnit tests directly from the JSP, or you could deploy
the JSP's and run a suite of client tests using JUnit and HTTPUnit. See
http://httpunit.sourceforge.net for details on HTTPUnit. I personally use
the latter approach for testing JSPs.

-Brian

-----Original Message-----
From: ud up [mailto:uddi88@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 24, 2001 12:00 AM

Subject: [junit] junit & JSP


HI fellas,
Ne idea of using JSP Test with Junit...
An Example would certainly be appreciated....
Thanx...
UD
